additional_requirement: focus on the ethical dilemma and its implications in real-world scenarios
explore ethical and psychological implications of digital life extension
discuss controversial ethical issues in modern medicine
analyze scenarios where individual interests conflict with collective good
explore strategies to prevent AI-related accidents and misuse
analyze dilemmas related to AI decision-making and human values
analyze the causes and impacts of bias in AI systems
discuss the legal and ethical measures to combat online child exploitation
evaluate the implications of AI-driven warfare technologies
discuss the potential risks and global political impacts
